config.jade.plugin_create_mininglaser.la: Show the core and tier in the overlay.
create_mininglaser.ponder.laser_multiblo: Place the first layer of Drill Casings.
Place the Hatch on the side for item output.
Use a Wrench on the Controller to form the multiblock.
create_mininglaser.ponder.insert_core.te: Right-click the Controller with a Drill Core to insert it.
Right-click with a Wrench to remove the Core.
create_mininglaser.ponder.output_setup.t: Items are output via the Hatch.
Attach a funnel here to collect items.
